title: League of Legends movie?
body: Hey guys, I sincerely think we should have a league movie! It would be amazing, since league is decently old and popular. This would include having like demacia vs noxus, piltover stuff, life in bandle city etc. , and also include the rift and stuff. Tell me what you think below! ( don't get too excited, this is going to take like a year to create or something)

replies.body: if its anything like the game, its gonna be a 3 hour long shitfest that you waste your money and want to kill yourself after experiencing.
Na, it's just going to be like based on their lores :P nothing to do like actual fighting in the rift :D

Yeah because fighting on the rift isn't part of the lore anymore.

RIP the League of Legends.

Hint: it's not worth the miniscule amount of money that it would make, when compared to the investment in say hiring another team for skins.

Example: Warcraft (movie) cost around the 160 million dollar mark, and has so far earned about 310 million (even with the shit ratings from everyone who doesn't understand the movie), the movie was also started in early 2014 (so 2 years ago)

a 200% on investment after 2 years isn't something worth it when they could make a skin and make a couple of million most likely ($5 skin, if 400k people bought it that is 2 million dollars, hence chroma skins).
BUT THINK ABOUT THE MONEY, RIOT, THINK ABOUT THE BILLIONS WE COULD OWN >:D JK  That is true :c

I honestly don't know how the plot would go. If it was noxuvs vs demacia vs ionia etc then who would win the war and stuff like that. Also, the lore that league made for champions are not even that great yet.

Riot have only just began to flesh out the League of Legends world. Sure there's been a lot of events happen, but as far as story telling, almost nothing.

Give them a couple more years to actually establish the world, and then ask :)
It would just be a bunch of people sitting around swearing at each other and getting angry

I really think this could work, I don't care who it follows as long as Darius dunks someone in it. They could even do some void stuff. Unfortunately I doubt this will happen as Riot doesn't have a big cinematic team.
